# "Glory in the Aurora"
## Scripture
> "The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands." - Psalm 19:1

## Reflection
As we gaze upon the breathtaking display of the Northern Lights, we are reminded of the awe-inspiring glory of God. The dancing colors and swirling patterns of the aurora borealis are a testament to the majesty and wonder of our Creator. Just as the Northern Lights illuminate the night sky, God's glory shines brightly in our lives, guiding us through the darkest of times. As we marvel at this celestial spectacle, let us not forget the One who painted this masterpiece. The Northern Lights are a fleeting yet breathtaking display, but God's glory is eternal and unchanging.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, as we behold the beauty of the Northern Lights, we are reminded of your glory and majesty. Help us to look beyond the fleeting wonders of this world and fix our eyes on your eternal glory. May the awe-inspiring display of the aurora borealis ignite a deeper sense of wonder and reverence for you in our hearts. As we gaze upon the night sky, may we be filled with a sense of gratitude and praise for the glory that you have revealed to us. Shine your light in our lives, Lord, and guide us on our journey with you. Amen.
